Album: 春光乍泄 电影原声大碟
Lyric:
[00:05.760]Imagine me and you, I do
[00:07.810]I think about you day and night,
[00:10.220]it's only right
[00:12.080]To think about the girl you love
[00:13.890]and hold her tight
[00:15.580]So happy together
[00:19.890]If I should call you up, invest a dime
[00:22.850]And you say you belong to me
[00:24.690]and ease my mind
[00:26.590]Imagine how the world could be,
[00:28.130]so very fine
[00:30.650]So happy together
[00:34.220]I can't see me lovin' nobody but you
[00:38.570]For all my life
[00:42.000]When you're with me,
[00:43.760]baby the skies'll be blue
[00:46.230]For all my life
